Description: Security Configuration as Code - Secure, highly available web application infrastructure in us-west-1

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

PublicSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Public Subnet in first AZ

PublicSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Public Subnet in second AZ

PrivateSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Private Subnet in first AZ

PrivateSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Private Subnet in second AZ

DatabaseSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Database Subnet in first AZ

DatabaseSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Database Subnet in second AZ

SSHAllowedCIDR.Description: CIDR block allowed to SSH to EC2 instances

KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances (leave empty if no SSH access needed)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer
Security group for web servers - allows traffic from ALB only
Security group for application servers - allows traffic from web tier only
Security group for database servers - allows traffic from app tier only

Properties.Description: KMS key for encrypting S3 buckets and other resources

Statement.Sid: Allow services to use the key

Properties.Description: API Gateway for secure web application
Checks that S3 buckets do not allow public read access
Checks that S3 buckets have server-side encryption enabled
Checks whether EC2 instances are in a VPC
Checks whether security groups disallow unrestricted SSH traffic

ApplicationS3BucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for application data

ApplicationS3BucketArn.Description: ARN of the S3 bucket for application data

LoadBalancerDNSName.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerArn.Description: ARN of the Application Load Balancer

APIGatewayURL.Description: URL of the API Gateway in prod stage

APIGatewayId.Description: ID of the API Gateway REST API

KMSKeyId.Description: ID of the KMS key for encryption

WAFWebACLArn.Description: ARN of the WAF Web ACL

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment

VPCFlowLogsLogGroup.Description: Name of the VPC Flow Logs CloudWatch Log Group

APIGatewayLogGroup.Description: Name of the API Gateway CloudWatch Log Group
